sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of all types of cough resulting from an affection with evil qi. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 9: 深師療五嗽，一曰上氣嗽，二曰飲嗽，三曰燥嗽，四曰冷嗽，五曰邪 嗽，四滿丸方 , “ Shen shi cures the five types of cough. The first is named ‘qi cough’, the second is named ‘rheum cough’, the third is called ‘dry cough’, the fourth is called ‘cold cough’, the fifth is called ‘ evil [qi] cough ’. [It calls for] the recipe for the ‘fourfold fullness pills ’”.
